ARMA regression with R

Logit model
Generalized Least Squares
GLM() package
Author
Affiliation

Simon-Pierre Boucher

Université Laval

Load necessary library for ARMA models

library(forecast)
Registered S3 method overwritten by 'quantmod':
  method            from
  as.zoo.data.frame zoo

Set seed for reproducibility

set.seed(123)

Generating simulated data for AR(1) model

Number of observations

n <- 100

Generate AR(1) time series with AR coefficient = 0.7 and white noise

ar1_data <- arima.sim(n = n, model = list(ar = 0.7))

Estimating AR(1) model

ar1_model <- Arima(ar1_data, order = c(1, 0, 0))

Print summary of AR(1) model

summary(ar1_model)
Series: ar1_data 
ARIMA(1,0,0) with non-zero mean 

Coefficients:
         ar1    mean
      0.7127  0.0226
s.e.  0.0685  0.2947

sigma^2 = 0.768:  log likelihood = -128.04
AIC=262.08   AICc=262.33   BIC=269.9

Training set error measures:
                       ME     RMSE       MAE      MPE     MAPE      MASE
Training set -0.001587819 0.867547 0.6921088 46.25563 196.1183 0.9250022
                     ACF1
Training set -0.000391426

Generating simulated data for MA(1) model

Generate MA(1) time series with MA coefficient = 0.5 and white noise

ma1_data <- arima.sim(n = n, model = list(ma = 0.5))

Estimating MA(1) model

ma1_model <- Arima(ma1_data, order = c(0, 0, 1))

Print summary of MA(1) model

summary(ma1_model)
Series: ma1_data 
ARIMA(0,0,1) with non-zero mean 

Coefficients:
         ma1     mean
      0.4492  -0.0415
s.e.  0.1335   0.1462

sigma^2 = 1.044:  log likelihood = -143.15
AIC=292.29   AICc=292.54   BIC=300.11

Training set error measures:
                      ME    RMSE       MAE      MPE    MAPE      MASE
Training set 0.004793875 1.01147 0.7970893 100.1947 249.372 0.7896934
                    ACF1
Training set -0.09805895

Generating simulated data for ARMA(1,1) model

Generate ARMA(1,1) time series with AR coefficient = 0.6, MA coefficient = 0.4, and white noise

arma11_data <- arima.sim(n = n, model = list(ar = 0.6, ma = 0.4))

Estimating ARMA(1,1) model

arma11_model <- Arima(arma11_data, order = c(1, 0, 1))

Print summary of ARMA(1,1) model

summary(arma11_model)
Series: arma11_data 
ARIMA(1,0,1) with non-zero mean 

Coefficients:
         ar1     ma1    mean
      0.5427  0.4886  0.3597
s.e.  0.0993  0.0978  0.3093

sigma^2 = 0.9585:  log likelihood = -138.8
AIC=285.6   AICc=286.02   BIC=296.02

Training set error measures:
                      ME      RMSE       MAE       MPE     MAPE      MASE
Training set 0.002257675 0.9642397 0.7840184 -49.37364 259.2859 0.8741441
                   ACF1
Training set 0.04999869
